00031 class Color {
00032     public:
00033         Color() { r() = g() = b() = a() = 0.; }
00034         Color(float, float, float, float = 1.);
00035         Color(const VecMath::Vector<4> &);
00036         Color(const QColor &);
00037 
00038         float &r() { return RGBA[0]; }  
00039         float r() const { return RGBA[0]; }  
00040         float &g() { return RGBA[1]; }  
00041         float g() const { return RGBA[1]; }  
00042         float &b() { return RGBA[2]; }  
00043         float b() const { return RGBA[2]; }  
00044         float &a() { return RGBA[3]; }  
00045         float a() const { return RGBA[3]; }  
00046 
00048         operator float *() { return RGBA; }
00049         Color operator *=(float);
00050         Color operator *=(const Color &);
00051         Color operator *(float);
00052         Color operator *(const Color &);
00053         Color operator +=(float);
00054         Color operator +(float);
00055         Color operator +=(const Color &);
00056         Color operator +(const Color &);
00057         void setComponentLowerLimit(float);
00058         void setComponentUpperLimit(float);
00059 
00061         operator std::string() const {
00062             std::ostringstream o;
00063             o <<"[ "<< RGBA[0] << ", "<< RGBA[1]<< ", "<< RGBA[2]<< " ]"
00064               << std::ends;
00065             return o.str();
00066         }
00067 
00068     private:
00069         float RGBA[4];  
00070 };

00077 inline Color::Color(float _r, float _g, float _b, float _a) {
00078     r() = _r;
00079     g() = _g;
00080     b() = _b;
00081     a() = _a;

00086 inline Color::Color(const VecMath::Vector<4> &x) {
00087     r() = x[0];
00088     g() = x[1];
00089     b() = x[2];
00090     a() = x[3];
00091 }

00095 inline Color::Color(const QColor &col) {
00096     qreal qr, qg, qb, qa;
00097     col.getRgbF(&qr, &qg, &qb, &qa);
00098     r() = qr;
00099     g() = qg;
00100     b() = qb;
00101     a() = qa;
00102 }

00106 inline Color Color::operator *=(float x) {
00107     for (unsigned i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
00108         RGBA[i] *= x;
00109         if (RGBA[i] > 1.) RGBA[i] = 1.;
00110         if (RGBA[i] < 0.) RGBA[i] = 0.;
00111     }
00112     return *this;
00113 }

00182 inline void Color::setComponentLowerLimit(float l) {
00183     for (unsigned i = 0; i < 3; i++) if (RGBA[i] < l) RGBA[i] = l;
00184 }
00185 
00188 inline void Color::setComponentUpperLimit(float u) {
00189     for (unsigned i = 0; i < 3; i++) if (RGBA[i] > u) RGBA[i] = u;
